tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
    disclosure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    position VARCHAR(100),
    conflict_description TEXT,
    disclosure_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE disclosures (
    disclosure_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    date_submitted DATE NOT NULL,
    reviewer_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE conflicts_of_interest (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   employee_name VARCHAR(255),
   department VARCHAR(255),
   disclosure_date DATE,
   conflict_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE disclosure_reviews (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   employee_id INT,
   reviewer_id INT,
   review_date DATE,
   comments TEXT,
   FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES conflicts_of_interest(id),
   FOREIGN KEY (reviewer_id) REFERENCES employees(id)
);
